scripts.prod-reference: cross-env BS_ENV=prod BS_PATHSFILE=paths BS_REFHOST=prod  backstop reference --configPath="node backstop.js"
scripts.prod-test: cross-env BS_ENV=prod BS_PATHSFILE=paths BS_TESTHOST=prod  backstop test --configPath="node backstop.js"
scripts.prod-approve: cross-env BS_ENV=prod BS_PATHSFILE=paths BS_TESTHOST=prod  backstop approve --configPath="node backstop.js"
